description: Oil futures rose in the early Asian session in a likely technical rebound after front-month WTI and Brent futures settled 1.6% and 1.3% lower, respectively, on Wednesday.

title: Gold Edges Up; Needs Catalyst to Break Record High

description: A behind-the-scenes look at four companies—why they decided to sell at the markets, how much they make and what they love about it.
